description: Weighted count of partitions with odd parts.
references: Andrews, George E. Ramanujan's "lost" notebook. V. Euler's partition identity. Adv. in Math. 61 (1986), no. 2, 156-164.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..300
mathematica: max = 48; f[n_, x_] := Product[ 1/(1-x^(2k+1)), {k, 0, n}]; g[x_] = Sum[ f[max/2, x] - f[n, x], {n, 0, max/2}]; CoefficientList[ Series[ g[x], {x, 0, max}], x] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 17 2011, after g.f. *)
prog: (PARI) /* set "infinity" */ oo = 50; /* G.f. for partitions with odd parts: */ Q(n,q) = prod(k=0,n,1/(1-q^(2*k+1)), 1+q*O(q^oo)); /* G.f. for A000009: */ Sq = Q(oo/2,q); /* G.f. for A005896: */ Sq0 = sum(n=0,oo/2, Sq-Q(n,q)); for(n=0,48,print1(polcoeff(Sq0,n)","))
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
